channel.title: The /Filmcast
channel.description: A Film / Movie Podcast for the Masses

item.title: Ep. 275 – Edge of Tomorrow
item.description: David and Devindra welcome Jeff Cannata to the /Filmcast! This week, we break down some new Star Wars news, plus Dave reports from the Seattle International Film Festival. Be sure to check out David’s interviews with the filmmakers behind Layover and Time Lapse. You … Continue reading →

item.title: FilmAid Broadcast Part 2 – David Wain, Director of Children’s Hospital
item.description: In Part 2 of our FilmAid broadcast, Scott Beggs from FilmSchoolRejects joins us to chat with writer/director David Wain about his thoughts on LARPing, his most powerful filmgoing experiences, and the making of Children’s Hospital. If you want to support the … Continue reading →

item.title: FilmAid Broadcast Part 6 – Jon Chu, Director of GI Joe: Retaliation
item.description: Our epic, 10-hour long FilmAid broadcast is complete, and the results were incredible: a ton of amazing guests on the /Filmcast and over $10,000 raised for FilmAid! We recorded many of the episodes and will be airing them mostly in … Continue reading →

item.title: Bonus Ep. – Where Is Our $10,000 Going?

item.title: Ep. 221 – Oz The Great and Powerful (GUEST: Laremy Legel, author of Film Critic)
